js_description: Interactive elements like carousels or modals for announcements or highlights. Smooth scrolling effects and interactive animations to enhance user engagement.
description: This is the main landing page that gives an overview of the site and its purpose. It aims to attract IT professionals by highlighting the benefits of joining, featuring testimonials, and showcasing upcoming events and announcements.
practice_features: A brief introduction, highlights of the benefits, and testimonials from current members. Information on upcoming events and webinars.
additional_features: Background animations, dynamic welcome message, and a featured carousel showcasing success stories. Real-time notifications for announcements and events.
page_style: Modern and clean with a focus on user engagement. Consistent use of the site's primary colors, fonts, and button styles. Parallax scrolling and responsive design ensuring compatibility across devices.

js_description: Form validation and submission handling, including real-time input validation and dynamic feedback for the user.
description: Page for new members to sign up by providing their personal information, skills, and contact details. The form ensures all necessary data is collected and provides feedback for incomplete or incorrect entries.
practice_features: User registration form with fields for personal information, skills, and contact details. Real-time validation and dynamic error messages.
additional_features: Interactive help tips and error messages, tooltips for form fields, progress indicator for form completion, and a CAPTCHA for spam prevention.
page_style: Simple and clean, focused on form usability. Consistent with main page's color scheme and fonts. Utilizes a multi-step form layout to enhance user experience.

js_description: Form validation and submission handling, including real-time feedback for form fields.
description: Page for existing members to log in. This page provides a secure and user-friendly interface for IT members to access their accounts. Users can enter their username and password, and the system will validate the credentials and provide appropriate feedback.
practice_features: User login form with real-time validation, error messages for incorrect credentials, and a 'Remember Me' option.
additional_features: Forgot password link, smooth transitions and animations for form interactions, loading animation on form submission, and tooltips for form fields.
page_style: Simple and clean, focused on form usability. Consistent with main page's color scheme and fonts. Utilizes a centered layout with ample white space to reduce cognitive load.

js_description: Interactive elements like accordions or tabs for detailed information, animated transitions for smoother navigation, and form validation for user inputs.
description: Page providing detailed information about the recruitment process, team structure, member testimonials, and company culture. Users can learn about the application steps, team goals, and what makes this IT team unique.
practice_features: Information sections about the team, recruitment process, benefits, and frequently asked questions. Interactive features like accordions for FAQs, and tabs for detailed sections.
additional_features: Embedded videos or images for better engagement, downloadable brochures or documents, and social media integration for easy sharing.
page_style: Informative and visually appealing, using consistent site colors and fonts. The layout includes a hero section with a background image, followed by content sections with ample white space for readability.

js_description: Form validation and submission handling. Real-time feedback for form fields and dynamic map updates.
description: Page for users to contact the recruitment team with an easy-to-use form and an interactive map showing the office location. Users can fill out their details and send a message directly to the team.
practice_features: Contact form including fields for name, email, and message. Real-time form validation and error messages.
additional_features: Interactive map showing office location with zoom and pan functionality. Tooltips for form fields providing additional guidance. Confirmation message upon successful form submission.
page_style: Simple and clean, focused on form usability. Consistent with main page's color scheme and fonts. Enhanced with subtle animations for form field interactions.

js_description: Handling dynamic content display and user interactions, including loading user-specific data, processing form submissions, and managing real-time notifications.
description: Member dashboard page showing personalized content tailored to the user's profile and activities. It provides an overview of the user's information, recent updates, and quick access to essential features.
practice_features: Personalized dashboard showing user information and updates, real-time notifications, quick access to profile editing, and other user-specific functionalities.
additional_features: Notifications and quick links to important sections, user activity feed, real-time updates, customizable widgets, and a help section for user support.
page_style: Functional and user-centric, using consistent site colors and fonts, with a clean and intuitive layout that highlights essential user information and actions. Subtle animations for interactive elements to enhance user experience.

layout.header: Contains logo, navigation menu, and user profile picture.
layout.sidebar: Provides quick links to different sections of the dashboard like notifications, settings, and help.
layout.main_content: Displays personalized information such as recent activities, notifications, and quick access buttons.
layout.footer: Contains site-wide links and contact information.

js_description: Display confirmation messages and possible redirects. Includes animations for message appearance and countdown for redirects.
description: Page displaying confirmation messages after form submissions. This page ensures users are informed about the successful completion of their actions and provides options for their next steps. Contains a countdown timer for automatic redirection.
practice_features: Display of confirmation messages with smooth fade-in animations. Countdown timer for automatic redirection.
additional_features: Option to redirect to other relevant pages after a few seconds. Provides users the ability to cancel the automatic redirect if they choose to stay on the page.
page_style: Simple and clean, focused on message display. Consistent with main page's color scheme and fonts. Uses subtle animations to enhance user experience.
